text:
As part of our build script we would like the developer to eyeball the main 
system properties file.  An ANT equivalent to 'cat' or 'type' would be great.
creator: murray.brandon@amcor.com.au

text:
<loadfile> just went in to the CVS tree; this lets you load a single file into 
a property. Does that suffice?
creator: steve_l@iseran.com

text:
User may reopen report by replying to Steve's question.  Marking it as fixed
